attributes.action: Review the method that websites use to trick people into giving permission for a website to pass on details to third parties
attributes.additional_details: I get spam mail every day from having my e-mail address details passed to third parties. A lot of the e-mails avoid the spam filter and my inboxes for http://hotmail.co.uk, http://yahoo.co.uk, and http://gamil.co.uk are full of junk. I think that the way websites get users to give permission to allow that website to pass details onto other websites should be reviewed.
